                                                                 A\n. Internal Sponsorships
                                               1.  Merit Scholarships for Bachelor Students
         Merit scholarship is awarded to the Top Three position holders of each Examination
   Board. Scholarship is also offered to the top three position holders in the NU admission
      merit list of each campus. Students awarded merit Scholarship, 100% tuition fee for 8
                         regular semesters must maintain a CGPA of â‰¥ 3.00 in each semester.
                                                                             2.  Study Loan
       Realizing that fees may not be affordable for some of the students, FAST-NU arranges
financial assistance in the form of interest-free study loans for bright indigent students.
